trans-unit.source: Provides the implementation for a client formatter sink that uses the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gir implementering for en klient formatering sink som bruker den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The function of the formatter sink is to generate the necessary headers and serialize the message to the stream.
trans-unit.target: Funksjonen formatering mottakeren er generere hodene som er nødvendig for å serialisere meldingen til dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: After the formatter sink, the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage> is forwarded to all sinks in the chain through the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink.ProcessMessage%2A> or <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink.AsyncProcessRequest%2A> calls.
trans-unit.target: Etter at mottakeren formatering av <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage>videresendes til alle mottakere i kjede gjennom den <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink.ProcessMessage%2A>eller <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink.AsyncProcessRequest%2A>kall.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink.AsyncProcessRequest%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink.ProcessMessage%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage>

trans-unit.source: At this stage the message has already been serialized and is provided as information only.
trans-unit.target: Meldingen allerede er serialisert og er angitt som bare informasjon i denne fasen.

trans-unit.source: Sinks that need to create or modify the message must be placed in the sink chain before the formatter.
trans-unit.target: Mottakere trenger for å opprette eller endre meldingen må plasseres i sink-kjede før formateringen.

trans-unit.source: This is easily achieved by implementing the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientFormatterSink> interface, which gives the impression of having a reference to the formatter sink.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjøres enkelt ved implementering av <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientFormatterSink>grensesnittet som gir inntrykk av har en referanse til formatering sink.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientFormatterSink>

trans-unit.source: The real formatter sink can then be placed later in the sink chain.
trans-unit.target: Reelle formatering mottakeren kan deretter plasseres senere i sink-kjede.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |`includeVersions`|Specifies whether the formatter will include versioning information.
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Beskrivelse | |--------------|-----------------| | `includeVersions`| Angir om formateringen inneholder informasjon om versjonskontroll.

trans-unit.source: Values are `true` or `false`.| > [!IMPORTANT] > Using an instance of this object with untrusted data or across an unsecure channel is a security risk.
trans-unit.target: Verdier er `true` eller `false`. | > [!IMPORTANT] > Med en forekomst av dette objektet med uklarerte data eller i en usikker kanal er en sikkerhetsrisiko.

trans-unit.source: Use this object only with trusted data and across a secure channel.
trans-unit.target: Bruk dette objektet bare klarerte og over en sikker kanal.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Untrusted Data Security Risks](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=330378).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [uklarerte Data sikkerhetsrisiko](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=330378).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BinaryClientFormatterSink"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BinaryClientFormatterSink"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The next <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink"></xref> in the sink chain.
trans-unit.target: Neste <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink"> </xref> i sink-kjede.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously processes the provided message.
trans-unit.target: Asynkront behandler den angitte meldingen.

trans-unit.source: The message to process.
trans-unit.target: Meldingen som skal behandles.

trans-unit.source: The sink that will receive the reply to the provided message.
trans-unit.target: Mottakeren som skal motta svar på den angitte meldingen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageCtrl"></xref> that provides a way to control the asynchronous message after it has been dispatched.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageCtrl"> </xref> som gir en måte å kontrollere asynkron melding når den er fordelt.

trans-unit.source: Requests asynchronous processing of a method call on the current sink.
trans-unit.target: Forespørsler Asynkron behandling av en annen metode kalle den gjeldende mottakeren.

trans-unit.source: A stack of channel sinks that called the current sink.
trans-unit.target: En bunke kanal vasker som kalles gjeldende mottakeren.

trans-unit.source: The message to process.
trans-unit.target: Meldingen som skal behandles.

trans-unit.source: The headers to add to the outgoing message that is heading to the server.
trans-unit.target: Overskrifter å legge til i den utgående meldingen overskrift til serveren.

trans-unit.source: The stream that is headed toward the transport sink.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten hoder mot transport mottakeren.

trans-unit.source: Requests asynchronous processing of a response to a method call on the current sink.
trans-unit.target: Forespørsler Asynkron behandling av et svar på en metode kalle den gjeldende mottakeren.

trans-unit.source: A stack of sinks that called the current sink.
trans-unit.target: En bunke vasker som kalles gjeldende mottakeren.

trans-unit.source: Information that is associated with the current sink, generated on the request side and needed on the response side.
trans-unit.target: Informasjon som er knyttet til den gjeldende sink generert på side forespørselen og kreves på den svar-siden.

trans-unit.source: The headers that are retrieved from the server response stream.
trans-unit.target: Hodet som er hentet fra serveren svar dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: The stream that is coming back from the transport sink.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten som kommer tilbake fra transport mottakeren.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref:System.IO.Stream> onto which the provided message is to be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer den <xref:System.IO.Stream>til som den angitte meldingen er serialiseres.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The GetRequestStream method is called by the formatter sink before it serializes the message.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetRequestStream kalles av formatering sink før den serializes meldingen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodCallMessage"></xref> that contains details about the method call.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodCallMessage"> </xref> som inneholder informasjon om metodekallet.

trans-unit.source: The headers to add to the outgoing message that is heading to the server.
trans-unit.target: Overskrifter å legge til i den utgående meldingen overskrift til serveren.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Stream> onto which the provided message is to be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IO.Stream>til som den angitte meldingen er serialiseres.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Gets the next <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink"></xref> in the sink chain.
trans-unit.target: Henter neste <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink"> </xref> i sink-kjede.

trans-unit.source: The next <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink"></xref> in the sink chain.
trans-unit.target: Neste <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink"> </xref> i sink-kjede.

trans-unit.source: Gets the next <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink"></xref> in the sink chain.
trans-unit.target: Henter neste <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink"> </xref> i sink-kjede.

trans-unit.source: The next <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink"></xref> in the sink chain.
trans-unit.target: Neste <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink"> </xref> i sink-kjede.

trans-unit.source: Requests message processing from the current sink.
trans-unit.target: Forespørsler behandlingstype fra gjeldende mottakeren.

trans-unit.source: The message to process.
trans-unit.target: Meldingen som skal behandles.

trans-unit.source: The headers to add to the outgoing message that is heading to the server.
trans-unit.target: Overskrifter å legge til i den utgående meldingen overskrift til serveren.

trans-unit.source: The stream that is headed toward the transport sink.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten hoder mot transport mottakeren.

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ITransportHeaders"></xref> interface that holds the headers that the server returned.
trans-unit.target: Låse denne metoden, inneholder en <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ITransportHeaders"> </xref> grensesnitt som inneholder topptekster serveren returnerte.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: Denne parameteren sendes ikke initialisert.

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a <xref:System.IO.Stream> that is coming back from the transport sink.
trans-unit.target: Låse denne metoden, inneholder en <xref:System.IO.Stream>som kommer tilbake fra transport sink.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: Denne parameteren sendes ikke initialisert.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of properties for the current channel sink.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>av egenskaper for gjeldende kanal mottakeren.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [[\<topic://cpconchannelformatterconfigurationproperties>]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [[\<topic://cpconchannelformatterconfigurationproperties >]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe).

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of properties for the current channel sink.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>av egenskaper for gjeldende kanal mottakeren.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Synchronously processes the provided message.
trans-unit.target: Synkron behandler den angitte meldingen.

trans-unit.source: The message to process.
trans-unit.target: Meldingen som skal behandles.

trans-unit.source: The response to the processed message.
trans-unit.target: Svaret på behandlede meldingen.
